text: My goals for the future would be technical artist in Houdini and yes I'm interested in FX mostly. I would some guidance on how to reach my goals and maybe some help in putting in motion some ideas that I have, I'm open to suggestions on how we should work together. Thanks

It's really up to you.
I can obviously give you some advice on work you'd be showing me, both artistically and/or for technical support in Houdini. It all depends on what you're aiming for.
If you'd like a position as an FX artist in a studio, whether it is commercials or films, you need a showreel that will make a potential recruiter know you will be able to handle a shot you are given and deliver the corresponding FX.

so, first step first, should you see an open position in a studio right now and would like to apply. Would you have a showreel that would make a recruiter think you are the correct person for the position?
and if not, what do you think is missing in that showreel?
